content:
Wexel family

1 Aron WEXEL                         - probably before 1835
 + Rudy                              c1775 - 1831 #322 (Getzel)

          married May 14, 1821 #25

    ?? + Simcha GLEITZ               1825

    ?? + Sara TRAIBITZ               1825

    + Rachel SCHELLER                1811 - after 1880

          + Ray HIRSHFIELD           1878-79 Easton PA - after 1940
